SUMMARY: NESTED | FIELD | CONSTR | METHOD DETAIL: FIELD | CONSTR | METHOD

ibis.io
Interface Serializable

public interface Serializable

This is the interface implemented by classes that have been rewritten using IOGenerator. In addition, IOGenerator usually also generates a constructor which reads the object from a IbisSerializationInputStream.

Method Summary
 void generated_DefaultReadObject(IbisSerializationInputStream in, int lvl)
          Reads the serializable fields at level lvl of this object.
 void generated_DefaultWriteObject(IbisSerializationOutputStream out, int lvl)
          Writes the serializable fields at level lvl of this object.
 void generated_WriteObject(IbisSerializationOutputStream out)
          Takes care of writing the object, including parent objects, to the IbisSerializationOutputStream parameter.
 

Method Detail

generated_WriteObject

void generated_WriteObject(IbisSerializationOutputStream out)
                           throws IOException
Takes care of writing the object, including parent objects, to the IbisSerializationOutputStream parameter.

Parameters:
out - the IbisSerializationOutputStream to which the object is written
Throws:
IOException - is thrown when an IO error occurs.

generated_DefaultWriteObject

void generated_DefaultWriteObject(IbisSerializationOutputStream out,
                                  int lvl)
                                  throws IOException
Writes the serializable fields at level lvl of this object. The "level" of an object is determined as follows:
  • if its superclass is serializable: the level of the superclass + 1.
  • if not: 1.

Parameters:
out - the IbisSerializationOutputStream to which the fields are written
lvl - the "level" of the fields written
Throws:
IOException - is thrown when an IO error occurs.

generated_DefaultReadObject

void generated_DefaultReadObject(IbisSerializationInputStream in,
                                 int lvl)
                                 throws IOException,
                                        ClassNotFoundException
Reads the serializable fields at level lvl of this object. The "level" of an object is determined as follows:
  • if its superclass is serializable: the level of the superclass + 1.
  • if not: 1.

Parameters:
in - the IbisSerializationInputStream from which the fields are read
lvl - the "level" of the fields read
Throws:
IOException - is thrown when an IO error occurs.
ClassNotFoundException
